description: Learn how Junie can assist developers throughout the entire software development lifecycle, from planning and requirements gathering to implementation, testing, deployment, and maintenance.
title: Junie in the Software Development Lifecycle: AI-Assisted Development from Start to Finish
categories: SDLC, Software Development, AI-Assisted Development, Testing, Planning
readme:
# Junie in the Software Development Lifecycle

Discover how Junie can enhance every stage of the software development lifecycle. Learn practical techniques for leveraging AI to improve planning, requirements gathering, design, implementation, testing, deployment, and maintenance.
short_description: Leverage Junie's capabilities to enhance every stage of the software development lifecycle.
